Name: Night of the Shrub Part 2
About the game: Night of the Shrub Part 2 is a short, visual novel, with a single storyline rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they wind their way through the Old Twermbly Place. Robert the robot is acting strangely, and Westfalea presses Doctor Ow for answers. Margrave Bougainvillea is up to something, and presses Truly into helping Ludmila. Far below in the pyramid, Shrub presses Rolf into entering the realm of the Guardian, whereby they might gain access to the many other worlds. And elevator buttons, also, are pressed. They have arrived at the weirdness - but it's only the beginning!
